runs.comm: starts with a length ball on middle and off, defended towards the off side
down the leg side this time, he'll have to re-bowl that one
on the pads again, Kula escaped last delivery but this time Gayle tickles it to fine leg for four, Sri Lanka have a deep square leg in place and no fine leg
on the thigh pad, clipped to square leg
shifts the line to offstump this time, blocked to the off side
appeal for lbw, but Chanderpaul is struck high on the pads, that would have likely sailed over
full and very wide outside off
length ball on legstump, nudged behind square leg by Chanders
full and wide, Chanderpaul muscles it towards mid-off
the shimmy to off and paddle to deep backward square seems very popular today, this time Chanderpaul gets it away for six
wide outside off, firmly swatted towards mid-off
four more but very lucky, jumps across the stumps and looks to guide the ball to fine leg, but is struck on the pads and the ball trickles to third man for four
much better from Chanderpaul, a powerful off-drive after coming down the track, between mid-off and extra cover for four
that's the end of Chanderpaul, a top-edge as he looks to swipe a ball very outside off, swirls towards short third man where it is safely held
classy shot from Sarwan to get his first run, a cut past a diving Dilshan at backward point
end of Gayle, and West Indies' chances fading, closes the face too early to a ball on middle stump, leading edge pops up towards extra cover, Mathews judges the catch nicely
chopped towards point by Sarwan
short and wide, stabbed towards backward point, where a diving Dilshan fields
full ball just outside off, driven back to the bowler, this is a superb over for Sri Lanka
elegantly drives a length ball towards mid-off for a sharp single
defended off the front foot towards backward point
length ball outside off, defended to the off side
whipped from outside off towards deep midwicket
on the pads, tucked behind backward square leg
back of a length just outside off, guided towards deep backward point for a single
another tidy over comes to end after the batsman clips the ball towards midwicket for a single
full delivery, driven down the ground for a single
back of a length and outside off, pushed towards extra cover
short and too wide outside off, Bravo looks to club that over cover but misses
overpitched and just outside off, driven down to mid-off
back of the hand slower ball from Kulasekara, outside off and full, batsman looked to guide to third man but misses
another slower ball, on off and middle, turned towards midwicket
a yorker on offstump to end the over, dug out towards the bowler
starts with one down the leg side, helped to short fine, a direct hit at the keeper's end would have been very interesting
whipped off the backfoot towards wide mid-on for a single
too far down the leg side, nice take by Sangakkara
on the pads, nudged towards square leg
tossed up a touch, spins into Bravo, who waits on the backfoot and plays a flamboyant lofted drive over cover
defended off the front foot towards the bowler
fired into legstump, defended by Bravo
shortish and wide, slugged to short cover
similar length, closer to off, cross-batted hit towards mid-on for a single
keeps it back of a length, swiped towards midwicket
length ball on middle and leg, played towards wide mid-on
West Indies need a lot more of this, overpitched outside off, lofted over extra cover for four
shuffles across and taps the ball towards midwicket for a single to end the over
starts with a wide down the leg side
Bravo looks to drive inside-out towards long-off, gets the outside edge towards third man
tossed up, well outside off, crunched towards sweeper cover
shorter this time, gets the front leg out of the way, swipes it to long-on
spins into the batsman after pitching outside off, batsman is hurried into defending that one
little shorter, on middle and leg, swung away between long-on and deep midwicket for four
short of length, in the corridor outside off, opens the face to steer the ball to third man
shortish and outside off, Bravo was eying the midwicket boundary though the ball was well outside off, misses
mistimes his shot from outside off towards mid-on
overpitched and heading for off, driven crisply back towards the bowler, who stops the ball as it thuds into his ankle
short ball outside off, batsman backs away looking to carve the ball towards cover
swung away behind square leg for four, still not too many off the over
length ball outside off, muscled down the ground to long-off
backs away and hacks the ball towards point
length ball, pitching on middle, tucked towards midwicket
short of length just outside off, dabbed towards third man
'Come on' is the call after the batsman plays the ball with soft hands towards point
clipped behind square leg for another single
full and outside off, carved towards sweeper cover
a yorker spearing into off, defended back to the bowler
low full toss this time, Sarwan gets a leading edge which just about clears Malinga
the bouncer this time, batsman thinks of pulling but decides against the stroke
Malinga makes the breakthrough, overpitched and outside off, sliced to short cover by Bravo
low full toss on the pads, punched towards mid-on
full and outside off again, played towards sweeper cover
big misunderstanding, played with soft hands towards point, Fletcher was out if there was a direct hit
pushed towards mid-on
tossed up but down the leg side
on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
off the backfoot,slashed towards midwicket
defended towards short midwicket by Sarwan
backs away and carves it towards deep extra cover

Sarwan's struggles are over, he chips the ball back to Mendis, charging out of the crease, nowhere near the pitch of the ball, goes through with the drive anyway, only as far as the bowler, will we see Pollard now?
big stride forward but is beaten as he looks to defend
flighted, pitched well outside off and spun in, Pollard doesn't pick it and is beaten
steered towards backward point, that was the legcutter
defended towards the bowler after taking a couple of steps out of the crease
short ball stays low, it was the legcutter again, Fletcher can't get bat on it
length ball just outside off, Pollard backs away and slaps it towards mid-off
swung away to deep square leg for a single
offspinner jags into the pads, Pollard looks to whip it away but it hits his pad and rolls awaya
down the leg side
clipped towards midwicket this time
keeps pegging away at the legstump line, turned towards backward square leg
a swipe off the backfoot lobs towards mid-on but lands short
Malinga starts with a low full toss heading for middle stump, dug out to midwicket direct hit at the non-striker's but Pollard is in
the ball is rarely travelling beyond the 30-yard circle here, this time clipped to midwicket
a yorker on legstump, very difficult to put away, squeezed towards extra cover
slips in the bouncer this time, outside off, batsman looks to swing it to midwicket but misses
a low full toss on middle and off, defended towards midwicket, super over this from Malinga
full and down the leg side, extra delivery coming up
on the pads, whipped to fine leg for a single
Pollard slices this one over short third man for his first boundary
end of Pollard, gets the front leg out of the way and looks to send the ball into orbit, only gets it as far as Kapugedera at wide long-on
punched to long-on for a single
skips away from leg and crunches the ball to sweeper cover
the doosra, looks to cut but is beaten
doesn't pick the legcutter, gets the outside edge to third man for four
batsman just about gets bat down in time to keep out that legstump yorker, digs it out to short midwicket
an attempted  yorker gone wrong, ends up as a low full toss outside leg, dispatched towards cow corner for four
no mistake this time from Malinga, this one homes into the base of middle stump to send Fletcher packing
full and wide, no footwork from Hinds so he can't reach that one
yorker just outside off, batsman gets the inside half of the bat on that, ball trickles back to the bowler
full and wide, room to stretch his arms, lovely timing from Hinds as he crashes it over sweeper cover for four
again it is overpitched and well outside off, guided down to third man for a single
shout for lbw, but that pitched outside leg
bends his knee and looks to sweep, misses
and again, the sweep doesn't connect with the ball
this time Mendis gets his man, it skids on after pitching on middle, struck in front of middle and leg, Taufel sends Hinds on his way
driven past backward point for four, nice-looking cut first up
swivels as he swings the ball towards deep square leg
a low full toss outside off, Taylor shuffles across off to try whip the ball to square leg, gets a leading edge towards the off side

yet another low full toss, much slower this time, Sammy misses, that's going on to hit middle an d leg, Rudi raises the finger as Malinga belts out a confident appeal, can WI play out 20 overs at least?
backs away and jabs a full ball outside off towards point
gets the front leg out of the way and drives the ball towards long-off for a single, get an extra run from an overthrow
slower full toss outside off, can't get bat an ball, Sangakkara doesn't collect cleanly, Taylor wants a run but is sent back
a rare length ball from Malinga, Taylor gets an inside edge that is dangerously close to off, ball goes to the left of the keeper
starts the final with a single to long-off
a full toss outside off, helped on its way towards the third man boundary
pitches it this time, full and outside off, Benn's swat misses the ball
overpitched on middle and leg, driven down to long-on
low full toss outside off, Taylor opens the face to adroitly guide the ball to third man for four
Mathews drops a skier at square leg off the last ball, perhaps the best time to drop a catch, Sri Lanka have been impressive today, they win by 57 runs to round off a day of one-sided matches
